name: MONDAY__GET_BOARDS
description: Retrieve boards from Monday.com workspace with their structure, items, and metadata.

query.default: query { boards(limit: $limit) { id name description state board_kind items { id name state } columns { id title type } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving boards

name: MONDAY__CREATE_BOARD
description: Create a new board in Monday.com with specified name, kind, and template structure.

query.default: mutation { create_board(board_name: $board_name, board_kind: $board_kind) { id name board_kind } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a board

name: MONDAY__DELETE_BOARD
description: Delete a board from Monday.com workspace permanently, removing all items and data.

query.default: mutation { delete_board(board_id: $board_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting a board

board_id.description: Board ID to delete

name: MONDAY__UPDATE_BOARD
description: Update board properties in Monday.com including name, description, and settings.

query.default: mutation { update_board(board_id: $board_id, board_attribute: $board_attribute, new_value: $new_value) { id name description } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating board

board_id.description: Board ID to update

new_value.description: New value for the board attribute

name: MONDAY__GET_ITEMS
description: Retrieve items from a specific board in Monday.com with their column values and status.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { items(limit: $limit) { id name state column_values { id text value } created_at updated_at } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving board items

board_id.description: Board ID to get items from

name: MONDAY__CREATE_ITEM
description: Create a new item in a Monday.com board with name and initial column values.

query.default: mutation { create_item(board_id: $board_id, item_name: $item_name, column_values: $column_values) { id name } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating an item

board_id.description: Board ID to create item in

column_values.description: JSON string of column values (e.g., '{"status": "Working on it", "text": "Description"}')

name: MONDAY__UPDATE_ITEM
description: Update column values for an existing item in Monday.com including status, text, and custom fields.

query.default: mutation { change_multiple_column_values(item_id: $item_id, board_id: $board_id, column_values: $column_values) { id name } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for updating item column values

board_id.description: Board ID containing the item

column_values.description: JSON string of column values to update

name: MONDAY__DELETE_ITEM
description: Delete an item from a Monday.com board permanently, removing all associated data.

query.default: mutation { delete_item(item_id: $item_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting an item

name: MONDAY__DUPLICATE_ITEM
description: Duplicate an item in Monday.com board with all its column values and properties.

query.default: mutation { duplicate_item(board_id: $board_id, item_id: $item_id, with_updates: $with_updates) { id name board { id } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for duplicating an item

board_id.description: Board ID containing the item

with_updates.description: Whether to include updates in the duplication

name: MONDAY__ARCHIVE_ITEM
description: Archive an item in Monday.com board to hide it from active view while preserving data.

query.default: mutation { archive_item(item_id: $item_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for archiving an item

name: MONDAY__MOVE_ITEM_TO_GROUP
description: Move an item to a different group within Monday.com board for better organization.

query.default: mutation { move_item_to_group(item_id: $item_id, group_id: $group_id) { id group { id title } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for moving item to group

name: MONDAY__GET_COLUMNS
description: Retrieve columns from a Monday.com board with their types, settings, and configuration.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { columns { id title type settings_str } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving board columns

board_id.description: Board ID to get columns from

name: MONDAY__CREATE_COLUMN
description: Create a new column in a Monday.com board with specified type and configuration.

query.default: mutation { create_column(board_id: $board_id, title: $title, column_type: $column_type) { id title type } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a column

board_id.description: Board ID to create column in

name: MONDAY__GET_GROUPS
description: Retrieve groups from a Monday.com board for organizing items into logical sections.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { groups { id title color items { id name } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving board groups

board_id.description: Board ID to get groups from

name: MONDAY__CREATE_GROUP
description: Create a new group in a Monday.com board to organize items into logical sections.

query.default: mutation { create_group(board_id: $board_id, group_name: $group_name, group_color: $group_color) { id title color } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a group

board_id.description: Board ID to create group in

name: MONDAY__DUPLICATE_GROUP
description: Duplicate a group in Monday.com board with all its items and structure.

query.default: mutation { duplicate_group(board_id: $board_id, group_id: $group_id, group_title: $group_title, add_to_top: $add_to_top) { id title } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for duplicating a group

board_id.description: Board ID containing the group

add_to_top.description: Whether to add the duplicated group to the top of the board

name: MONDAY__DELETE_GROUP
description: Delete a group from a Monday.com board, removing all items within the group.

query.default: mutation { delete_group(board_id: $board_id, group_id: $group_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting a group

board_id.description: Board ID containing the group

name: MONDAY__GET_USERS
description: Retrieve users from Monday.com workspace with their profiles, roles, and activity status.

query.default: query { users(limit: $limit) { id name email enabled is_admin is_guest created_at } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving users

name: MONDAY__ADD_USERS_TO_WORKSPACE
description: Add new users to Monday.com workspace by email with specified roles and team assignments.

query.default: mutation { add_users_to_workspace(user_emails: $user_emails, user_kind: $user_kind) { id name email } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for adding users to workspace

user_emails.description: Array of user email addresses to invite

name: MONDAY__CREATE_UPDATE
description: Add an update or comment to an item in Monday.com for team collaboration and progress tracking.

query.default: mutation { create_update(item_id: $item_id, body: $body) { id body created_at creator { name } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating an update

item_id.description: Item ID to add update to

name: MONDAY__GET_UPDATES
description: Retrieve updates and comments from Monday.com items for team communication and activity tracking.

query.default: query { items(ids: [$item_id]) { updates(limit: $limit) { id body created_at creator { name email } replies { id body creator { name } } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving item updates

item_id.description: Item ID to get updates from

name: MONDAY__LIKE_UPDATE
description: Like or unlike an update in Monday.com for engagement and team interaction.

query.default: mutation { like_update(update_id: $update_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for liking an update

name: MONDAY__CLEAR_ITEM_UPDATES
description: Clear all updates from a Monday.com item for cleanup and organization.

query.default: mutation { clear_item_updates(item_id: $item_id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for clearing item updates

item_id.description: Item ID to clear updates from

name: MONDAY__GET_WORKSPACES
description: Retrieve workspaces available in Monday.com account with their settings and team information.

query.default: query { workspaces { id name kind description created_at users { id name email } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving workspaces

name: MONDAY__GET_TEAMS
description: Retrieve teams from Monday.com workspace with their members and permissions.

query.default: query { teams { id name picture_url users { id name email } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving teams

name: MONDAY__CREATE_TEAM
description: Create a new team in Monday.com workspace for organizing users and managing permissions.

query.default: mutation { create_team(name: $name, user_ids: $user_ids) { id name } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a team

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to add to the team

name: MONDAY__ADD_USERS_TO_TEAM
description: Add existing users to a Monday.com team for better organization and permissions management.

query.default: mutation { add_users_to_team(team_id: $team_id, user_ids: $user_ids) { id users { id name } } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for adding users to team

team_id.description: Team ID to add users to

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to add to the team

name: MONDAY__GET_TAGS
description: Retrieve tags from Monday.com workspace for labeling and organizing items across boards.

query.default: query { tags { id name color } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving workspace tags

name: MONDAY__CREATE_TAG
description: Create a new tag in Monday.com workspace for labeling and categorizing items.

query.default: mutation { create_tag(tag_name: $tag_name, tag_color: $tag_color) { id name color } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a tag

name: MONDAY__GET_FOLDERS
description: Retrieve folders from Monday.com workspace for organizing boards hierarchically.

query.default: query { folders(limit: $limit) { id name color children { id name } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving folders

name: MONDAY__CREATE_FOLDER
description: Create a new folder in Monday.com workspace to organize boards into logical hierarchies.

query.default: mutation { create_folder(name: $name, color: $color, parent_folder_id: $parent_folder_id) { id name color } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a folder

parent_folder_id.description: Parent folder ID for nested organization

name: MONDAY__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a webhook in Monday.com to receive real-time notifications for board and item changes.

query.default: mutation { create_webhook(board_id: $board_id, url: $url, event: $event) { id board_id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a webhook

board_id.description: Board ID to create webhook for

name: MONDAY__DELETE_WEBHOOK
description: Delete a webhook from Monday.com to stop receiving notifications for specific events.

query.default: mutation { delete_webhook(id: $id) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for deleting a webhook

name: MONDAY__SEARCH_ITEMS
description: Search for items across Monday.com boards using keywords and filters.

query.default: query { items_page_by_column_values(board_id: $board_id, columns: $columns, limit: $limit) { items { id name column_values { id text } board { id name } } cursor } }
query.description: GraphQL query for searching items by column values

board_id.description: Board ID to search in (optional for global search)

name: MONDAY__GET_ACTIVITY_LOGS
description: Retrieve activity logs from Monday.com for auditing and tracking all workspace changes.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { activity_logs(limit: $limit) { id event created_at data user { name email } } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving activity logs

board_id.description: Board ID to get activity logs from

limit.description: Number of activity logs to return

name: MONDAY__GET_BOARD_SUBSCRIBERS
description: Retrieve subscribers of a Monday.com board to see who receives notifications about board changes.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { subscribers { id name email } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving board subscribers

board_id.description: Board ID to get subscribers from

name: MONDAY__ADD_SUBSCRIBERS_TO_BOARD
description: Add subscribers to a Monday.com board to receive notifications about board activities and changes.

query.default: mutation { add_subscribers_to_board(board_id: $board_id, user_ids: $user_ids, kind: $kind) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for adding subscribers to board

board_id.description: Board ID to add subscribers to

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to add as subscribers

name: MONDAY__REMOVE_SUBSCRIBERS_FROM_BOARD
description: Remove subscribers from a Monday.com board to stop notifications about board activities.

query.default: mutation { delete_subscribers_from_board(board_id: $board_id, user_ids: $user_ids) { id } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for removing subscribers from board

board_id.description: Board ID to remove subscribers from

user_ids.description: Array of user IDs to remove as subscribers

name: MONDAY__GET_BOARD_VIEWS
description: Retrieve custom views from a Monday.com board including filters, sorting, and layout configurations.

query.default: query { boards(ids: [$board_id]) { views { id name type settings_str } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving board views

board_id.description: Board ID to get views from

name: MONDAY__CREATE_BOARD_VIEW
description: Create a custom view in Monday.com board with specific filters, sorting, and display settings.

query.default: mutation { create_board_view(board_id: $board_id, name: $name, type: $type, settings_json: $settings_json) { id name type } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating board view

board_id.description: Board ID to create view for

name: MONDAY__GET_ASSETS
description: Retrieve file assets from Monday.com items including documents, images, and attachments.

query.default: query { assets(ids: [$asset_ids]) { id name file_extension file_size url created_at } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving assets

asset_ids.description: Array of asset IDs to retrieve

name: MONDAY__CREATE_NOTIFICATION
description: Create a notification in Monday.com to alert team members about important updates or changes.

query.default: mutation { create_notification(text: $text, user_id: $user_id, target_id: $target_id, target_type: $target_type) { id text } }
query.description: GraphQL mutation for creating a notification

name: MONDAY__GET_ACCOUNT
description: Retrieve account information from Monday.com including workspace details and billing info.

query.default: query { account { id name plan { period max_users version } } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving account info

name: MONDAY__GET_COMPLEXITY
description: Retrieve API complexity usage information from Monday.com to monitor rate limits and optimize queries.

query.default: query { complexity { before after reset_in_x_seconds } }
query.description: GraphQL query for retrieving API complexity usage
